text:
Hey, guys!!
I'm having difficulty with the form module and wanted to see if someone could help me.
I created a form module based on the default module, but when I insert it on a page, the form doesn't appear and continues with the message "no form selected".
I noticed that when using others form modules, an update button appears to insert the form. But the one I created doesn't show this option and I can't figure out what's missing for the module to work correctly.
